sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词后跟on(upon)，均有"依赖，依靠"之意。
means: depend ： 侧重指因自身能力不足或缺乏自信心而依靠他人或物给予帮助或支持。
rely ： 通常包含着以前的经验证明对方是能依赖的意思。

sentence.Network_en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentence.Network_cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentence.Network_en: Whether such properties are a good deal will depend on individual situations.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样的地产是否可获得大笔收益还要视具体情形而定。

sentence.Network_en: They depend on the goodwill of visitors to pick up rubbish.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们相信游客会自觉捡起垃圾。

职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... departure 起程，背离，发射，飞出 depend 取决于，靠，依赖，信任 dependent 依靠的， …

list.abs: 其中依赖（Dependency）的关系最弱，而关联（Association），聚合 （Aggregation），组合（Composition）表示的关系依次增强 …
最常见的依赖关系(dependency)是一种使用关系，譬如顾客类别里头有一个计算年度交易总额操作好了，在这个操作中必须连到一群 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... depend v 依靠 dependent a 依赖的 dependable a 可靠的.
形容人性格的词汇 ... dedicated 有奉献精神的； dependable 可靠的 diplomatic 老练的，有策略的；.
项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Departmental Budget 部门预算 Dependability 可靠性 Dependencies 依赖关系.

lj.lj_ls: 做八到十个汉堡包（依大小而定）。

lj.lj_ly: [with clause]the article sneered or just condescended, &B{depending on how} you read it.
lj.lj_ls: 这篇文章不是在嘲笑就是在摆架子，就看你如何解读了。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to express uncertainty or qualification in answering a question

lj.lj_ly: How many people use each screen? It all depends.
lj.lj_ls: 每个屏幕有多少人使用？这要看情况。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 3); also in the sense 'wait or be in suspense'): from Old French dependre, from Latin dependere, from de- 'down' + pendere 'hang'

entry.def: If you say that one thing depends on another, you mean that the first thing will be affected or determined by the second.

example.ex: The cooking time needed depends on the size of the potato...
example.tran: 所需的烹饪时间取决于土豆的大小。

example.ex: What happened later would depend on his talk with De Solina...
example.tran: 日后之事将有赖于他与德索利纳的谈话结果。

entry.def: If you depend on someone or something, you need them in order to be able to survive physically, financially, or emotionally.

example.ex: They may hate what he does but their survival depends on him...
example.tran: 他们或许讨厌他的营生，但他们要想活下来必须依靠他。

example.ex: He depended on his writing for his income...

entry.def: If you can depend on a person, organization, or law, you know that they will support you or help you when you need them.

example.ex: 'You can depend on me,' Cross assured him.
example.tran: “你可以信赖我，”克罗斯向他保证。

entry.def: You use depend in expressions such as it depends to indicate that you cannot give a clear answer to a question because the answer will be affected or determined by other factors.

example.ex: 'But how long can you stay in the house?' – 'I don't know. It depends.'...
example.tran: “但你能在这所房子里呆多久呢？”——“我不知道，这要看情况。”

example.ex: It all depends on your definition of punk, doesn't it?
example.tran: “这全视乎你对朋克摇滚乐的定义，不是吗？”

entry.def: You use depending on when you are saying that something varies according to the circumstances mentioned.

example.ex: I tend to have a different answer, depending on the family...
example.tran: 根据家庭的不同，我往往会给出不同的答案。

example.ex: People in the rest of the country celebrated independence even later, depending on when the news of Congress's action reached them.
example.tran: 该国其他地区的人们庆祝独立的时间甚至更晚，这要取决于有关国会决定的消息何时传到了他们那里。

means.word_mean: 1. be contingent upon (something that is ellided);

sentences.sentence: "you can count on me to help you any time"
"Depend on your family in times of crisis"

auth_sentence.content: Interest rates depend on the borrower's credit history.
auth_sentence.res_content: Interest rates depend on the borrower's credit history.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Interest rates depend on the borrower's credit history.

auth_sentence.content: It will depend on the person, of course.
auth_sentence.res_content: It will depend on the person, of course.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It will depend on the person, of course.

auth_sentence.content: Others depend on declining levels of overseas development aid.
auth_sentence.res_content: Others depend on declining levels of overseas development aid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Others depend on declining levels of overseas development aid.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =expend,表示"花费,支付"; 2. 最初意思为"称重量而衡量……",引申出花费,支付; 3. =hang,表示"悬挂"

stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+able可以……的→adj.可依赖的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depend[v.[on]取决于,依靠,信赖,相信]+ent……的→adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的
im进入+pending即将发生的→adj.即将发生的,逼近的
in不+dependent[adj.依靠的,依赖的,从属的;随…而定的]→不依靠[别的人,事或物]
pend悬挂+ing正……的→悬挂之中→即将发生的
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的
append[v.附加,添加,悬挂]+ix表名词→n.附录,附属物;阑尾,盲肠
pend悬挂+ulum东西→挂着[摆动]的东西→钟摆
per全部+pend悬挂+ic+ular表形容词→全部挂着的→垂直的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 花费, 消耗, 用尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: s+pend花费,支付→v.花费, 消耗, 用尽 v.度过, 消磨
ap加强动作+pend悬挂→挂上去→悬挂
de下+pend悬挂→附属于另一物件
sus在……下面+pend挂→挂在下面→悬挂

Sentence.sentence: Likewise, theimpactof this warming will be very different depending on where you are—coastal areas must worry about rising sea levels, while Siberia and northern Canada may become more habitable (宜居的) andappealingfor humans than these areas are now.

Again, in Colombian, a speaker of English would have to know that when he indicates height he most choose between different gestures depending on whether he is referring to a human being or an animal.
It depends on which student you are talking about.
This mission depends on traditions of rational discourse and vigorous defense of the scientific method.
That depends a little bit on the price.
Because so many of our modern technologies and services depend on oil, nations, corporations, and institutions that control the trade in oil exercise extraordinary power

means.word_mean: 决定于, 视…而定, 取决于

sentences.en: It all depends.I have certain doubts about it.
sentences.cn: 这很难说, 得看情况。

jushi.english: It all depends.I have certain doubts about it.
Sometimes we're busy and sometimes we're not so busy, that depends.
jushi.chinese: 有时我们很忙,有时不太忙,得看情况。

jushi.english: “What will you do next?”“I don't know.It all depends.”
jushi.chinese: 下一步你将做什么,我不知道,得看情况。
